result.reason: DockPanel Suite already supports float windows (FloatWindowNG exists); need to add explicit 'Move tab to new window' context menu action on connection tabs
result.approach: Add a 'Move to New Window' context menu item on connection tabs that programmatically calls DockPane.Float() to detach the active tab into a FloatWindowNG instance

attempts.raw_output:
The codebase already uses WeifenLuo DockPanel Suite with `FloatWindowNG` which supports undocking tabs to float windows. This is a DockPanel Suite built-in capability â€” tabs can already be dragged out to float. The feature request is about a more explicit "Move to new window" action (e.g., context menu).
